long_description: infinity plumbing inc. has built a solid reputation over the past 35 years as a leader in the plumbing industry throughout southern california. specializing in residential and commercial copper re-piping, we are dedicated to offering the finest craftsmanship and ensuring long-lasting solutions for our clients. whether you're dealing with outdated piping or need a comprehensive re-piping solution, our experienced team is here to provide unparalleled service that meets the highest standards in the industry. we take pride in our ability to combine expertise, quality, and customer satisfaction, making infinity plumbing inc. the go-to choice for copper re-piping and all your plumbing needs in los angeles and beyond.
